person.persName: Thomas Jeff Cofer (Christian County, Kentucky, cabinetmaker and soldier.)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, cabinetmaker and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Martha F. Simmons Cofer in Christian County on October 17, 1849. Father of John Cofer, George Cofer, and Mary Cofer. Cabinetmaker in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1850. Cabinetmaker in Christian County in 1860. Mechanic in Christian County in 1863. Served in the 52nd Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private and corporal from March 3, 1864 to March 11, 1865.
